title: looking for coach for plat team
body:
looking for a coach that can help a plat team improve
add me ingame (tg danger)

ty

replies.body: hello. i have some experience coaching teams. added you in game. atm just focused on being a player but experience is still good so i dont mind helping out :)
Over 3500 hours game time, I've coached over 20 players gold and above (highest ranking of said players being diamond 3). Add me if you wanna talk
